homepage.tutorial.button.description: The label for the tutorial button

feature.easy.title.description: Title for Easy to Use feature

feature.easy.description.message: HostSwitch is designed to be intuitive from the command line. It also features an interactive mode navigable with arrow keys.
feature.easy.description.description: Description for Easy to Use feature

feature.backup.description.message: Automatically backs up your current hosts file before every switch. Restore to the original state anytime if needed.

feature.profiles.description.message: Save hosts settings as profiles for each environment like 'Local', 'Docker', 'Prod'. Sharing settings with team members is easy.
